actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish a program to facilitate the purchase of life insurance by cancer victims.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish a program under which life insurance with a face value of not less than $5,000 shall be made available at affordable rates to individuals who have cancer. Specifies the percentage of the face value of the policy to be paid beneficiaries of insureds who die from cancer within four years of having obtained the policy.

titles.title: A bill to establish a program to facilitate the purchase of life insurance by cancer victims.
